original_text: The prophet said to the king, ‘This is what the Lord says to you: “I decided that a man should die, but you have let him go free. So you must pay for his life with your life. Your people will receive the trouble that his people deserved.” ’
korean_text: 그가 왕께 아뢰되 여호와의 말씀이 내가 멸하기로 작정한 사람을 네 손으로 놓았은즉 네 목숨은 그의 목숨을 대신하고 네 백성은 그의 백성을 대신하리라 하셨나이다

sentences.original_text: The prophet said to the king
This is what the Lord says to you
I decided that a man should die
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 한 사람이 죽어야 한다고 결정했다

sentences.original_text: but you have let him go free
So you must pay for his life with your life
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너는 그의 생명을 네 생명으로 대가를 치러야 한다

sentences.original_text: Your people will receive the trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 네 백성은 그 고통을 받을 것이다
